snippet: Mr. Vahanian’s 1961 social critique, “The Death of God: The Culture of Our Post-Christian Era,” gave a name to a seemingly atheistic but widely misunderstood theological movement.
abstract: Gabriel Vahanian, professor and theologian linked to the 'Death of God' theological movement, dies at age 85.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Vahanian’s 1961 social critique, “The Death of God: The Culture of Our Post-Christian Era,” gave a name to a seemingly atheistic but widely misunderstood theological movement.

headline.main: Gabriel Vahanian, Professor, Dies at 85; Was Linked to ‘Death of God’ Movement
headline.print_headline: Gabriel Vahanian, Professor, Dies at 85; Was Linked to ‘Death of God’ Movement
